message:
Have #opengov and #civictech news to share?

If you have updates from Taiwan that you'd like to share globally, I wanted to invite you to post via the 6800 member Open Government and Civic Technology Facebook Group:
   https://www.facebook.com/groups/opengovgroup/

Posts in any language are welcome. We have 3-6 interesting posts a day. In addition to sharing, everyone is welcome to join.
story: Steven Clift shared a group to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
